packages.name: Yet-Another-BlueDump-Mod
packages.title: Yet Another BlueDump MOD (YABDM)
packages.author: icksasa, DarkMatterCore
packages.details: YABDM is a modification of BlueDump capable of dumping any type of title installed in your Wii console to a WAD file in a SD Card or an USB storage device. It can also backup and restore savegames in their unencrypted form, and convert content.bin files generated by the System Menu on the SD card to WAD files.
